name: Neon Block Breaker (SnooRegrets)
description:
Hey, everyone !! I am back with another game!

I always wanted to make a neon-themed game so here it is. A remake of the classic block breaker. I am still a beginner learning unity, and while following up with an Udemy course, learners were supposed to tweak the game and upload it online. 

I spent way too much time tweaking it according to the way I wanted and gave it a complete makeover. I think I did justice to my idea.  Also,  learnt loads of stuff along the way. 

I hope you guys enjoy it. :)

Thank you for playing :)

Developer - Sahil Sharma

P.S - This is not a complete game. I have just established a foundation and will further develop it as I learn more about Unity game development. But until then, I hope you find this enjoyable.

Credits : 

Music : 

Free NCS Vaporwave trap beat by Karl Markus Hanevik

Jorge Hernandez - Chopsticks (NCS 8 bit music)

The Whole Other - 8-bit Dreamscape (NCS 8-bit music)

EVA - 失望した [Synthwave]
